game_description: You are floating in air, seeing some big objects floating around you. Time is running but what's the purpose? Somewhere between those objects is a pearl. Catch it and catch it again, until you crash or time runs out. "Oh, a lucky box. Wonder what I get from it. Hopefully not missile to chase me again. Oh, it is missile..." That's not all. There is good music and load of settings for you to get as fun experience as possible.
